title: Gram - ablative - deserto lecto - Ovid Heroides 1

content.description:
Non ego deserto iacuissem frigidafrigidus, -a, -um, adj.: cold lecto, 
nec querererqueror, -i: to complain tardos ire relicta dies.
content.question: In the sentence, deserto lecto specifies

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2

skill.text: 1.B: Describe how grammar contributes to the meaning and function of Latin words and phrases in context.
